title: Security Guard
description: Ensured safety and security through regular patrols, incident management, and customer service.
accomplishments: Patrolled premises regularly to maintain order and establish presence.
Responded to alarms and dispatched authorities when necessary.
Provided assistance to customers, visitors, and employees, ensuring a positive experience.
Documented daily activities and incidents, producing clear and concise reports.
Deescalated potential conflicts and managed confrontations with professionalism.
Monitored security cameras and conducted regular inspections to prevent theft, vandalism, and other security breaches.
Acted quickly in emergency situations, following established protocols.
Maintained up-to-date knowledge of security procedures and participated in regular training sessions.
